author: Staff Reporter
text:
‘Suvidha’ superfast special trains between Chennai Central and Ernakulam Junction will be operated to clear extra traffic.

According to a press release, Train No. 00645 Chennai Central–Ernakulam Jn. ‘Suvidha’ superfast special train will leave Chennai Central at 10.30 p.m. on February 12 and reach Ernakulam Jn. at 10.50 a.m. the next day.

Train No.00646 Ernakulm Jn.–Chennai Central ‘Suvidha’ superfast special train will leave Ernakulam Jn. at 7 p.m. on February 14 and reach Chennai Central at 7.15 a.m. the next day.The trains will stop at Katpadi, Erode, Coimbatore, Palakkad and Thrissur. Advance reservations for the above trains are open.
title: Special trains between Chennai and Ernakulam
